snippet: For the first time, the annual request includes development aid for Syria’s neighbors that have been overwhelmed with refugees.
abstract: United Nations is seeking $8.4 billion to help nearly 18 million victims of Syria’s conflict during 2015; request includes development aid for communities in neighboring countries overwhelmed by fleeing refugees.
